news.title: Law Firm Associates: Set Yourself Up for Greater Success in the Post-Pandemic World
news.description: Getting ahead in the legal profession often takes more than just legal acumen. Long-term success also requires a strategic approach to building a strong reputation and professional network. Check out this Justia Webinar exploring strategies law firm associates can employ to build this foundation for achievement.

news.title: Promoting Success by Reducing Bias in Recruitment and Talent Management at Your Law Firm
news.description: Data shows that focusing on diversity and inclusion not only improves your business’ recruitment and retention efforts but also increases the company’s profitability and performance. To learn more about inclusive talent management for your law firm, view this recent Justia Webinar.

news.title: Justia Legal Guides: Medical Malpractice Law Center
news.description: When people go to the doctor, they expect to get better rather than worse. Unfortunately, this doesn’t always happen. Justia provides a Medical Malpractice Law Center to help inform injured patients about their legal options.
